alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Madison; Pierce; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:17PM CDT until July 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Western Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Norfolk, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Madison around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Leigh, Creston and Clarkson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
